divs: Sighting DetailsWe were going to area 51... I was taking pictures of the sand devils and this appeard in the picture on the left side. I't a no fly zone... didn't notice it there but found it in the picture.
Summary: Unknown object out the window of the car (upper left side) with trail of smoke?
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around August 2nd 2009
